tccf.title: ABOUT TCCF
tccf.description: Taiwan Creative Content Fest (TCCF)” is a major annual event in the Asian creative content industry, attracting buyers and sellers internationally to converge and engage in networking and commercial negotiations. Divided into three main sections⸺PITCHING, MARKET, and FORUM⸺TCCF provides business services for the cultural content industry. By matching promising IPs with international financiers, driving commercial transactions and development between professionals worldwide, and facilitating the exchange of practical experiences and future industry trends, TCCF acts as a bridge that connects content creators and professional talents with industry resources.

pitching.title: PITCHING
pitching.description:
TCCF PITCHING brings together promising content proposals from domestic and international markets, including feature films, series, animations, documentaries, publishing, comics, and original story concepts. It attracts professionals from the global content industry, facilitating the matching of proposals with international resources and funding, thereby fostering the creation of globally popular works. Selected teams will have the opportunity to compete for sponsored awards and prizes provided by TAICCA and other organizations.



The 2024 TCCF PITCHING conference will officially take place from November 5th (Tuesday) to November 8th (Friday) at Taipei’s Skylight Convention Center, Nangang Exhibition Center, Hall 2, 7F. It will be divided into two main sections: “Project to Screen” and “Story to Screen”. Showcasing highly promising film and television projects and story proposals, TCCF PITCHING is the premier destination for international industry professionals seeking original content from Asia!

market.title: MARKET
market.description: “TCCF MARKET” focuses on facilitating rights transactions of international audiovisual content and promising IPs, expanding integration within the industry chain. MARKET encompasses operators and professionals from sectors as exemplified by content development, filming resources, and visual technologies, serving as a platform to explore opportunities for commercial collaboration and networking, thereby expanding the global market.

forum.title: FORUM
forum.description: The FORUM section delves into international collaboration and invites key figures from the domestic and international content industries to share practical experiences and future industry trends, offering insights into the forefront of diverse international collaborations and industry dynamics.

LoginDialog.title: 2024 TCCF Account User Terms
LoginDialog.content: Please fill in the following basic information. This will help us better understand your needs and preferences, allowing us to provide you with more personalized and efficient services.
LoginDialog.notice_paragraph_1: Thank you for registering your 2024 Taiwan Creative Content Fest (TCCF) account. Organized by the Taiwan Creative Content Agency (TAICCA), the 2024 TCCF will be held from Nov. 5 to Nov. 8 at Nangang Exhibition Center, Hall 2, 7F. The event attracts buyers and sellers from all over the world to Taiwan every year to engage in networking and commercial negotiations, showcase audiovisual and story proposals, and promote international collaboration and development.
LoginDialog.notice_paragraph_2: Below are the user terms that must be adhered to when using the TCCF website (“this platform”). Please read them carefully:

notice_list.list_item_1: 1.Data accuracy: When using this platform, you must ensure all information you provide is true, accurate, completely, and up to date. It is prohibited to provide false, inaccurate, or misleading information, especially company names, contact information, and other key details.
notice_list.list_item_2: 2.Data responsibility: You are fully responsible for all information you submit on this platform. TAICCA is not liable for any loss or damage caused by the provision of false information. If it is discovered that you have provided false or misleading information, TAICCA reserves the right to immediately revoke your right to participate in the 2024 TCCF and ban you from future events.
notice_list.list_item_3: 3.Data privacy: The information you provide will only be used for services and functions related to the 2024 TCCF. TAICCA will protect your personal privacy in accordance with relevant laws and regulations.
notice_list.list_item_4: 4.Legal compliance: When using this platform and participating in the 2024 TCCF, you must comply with all applicable laws and regulations as well as these terms.
notice_list.list_item_5: 5.Terms updates: TAICCA reserves the right to amend or update these user terms at any time. Any chances will be announced on this platform, and you are responsible for regularly checking for updated content.

LoginDialog.notice_paragraph_3: Thank you for your support and participation in the 2024 TCCF. We look forward to seeing you there!
LoginDialog.notice_paragraph_4: If you have any questions or require further assistance, please contact our customer service team at contact@tccf.tw .

goal_list.list_item_7: Insight into Market Trends & Industry Landscapes

InputMessage.label_1:
Up to three posters. If there is more than one exhibited work, please select one of the works and upload its poster or vertical key art for the TCCF Market catalog.

File requirements:

Format: TIFF, JPG, PNG

Image Size: 25mm x 35mm

Resolution: 300 dpi

Size: Under 2MB
